name: WordPress Advanced Coupons for WooCommerce Coupons plugin SQL注入漏洞
product: ["WordPress Advanced Coupons for WooCommerce Coupons plugin <=4.6.8"]
description: WordPress Advanced Coupons for WooCommerce Coupons plugin是专为WooCommerce设计的免费插件，通过扩展优惠券功能提升电商营销效果。WordPress Advanced Coupons for WooCommerce Coupons plugin存在SQL注入漏洞，该漏洞源于应用缺少对外部输入SQL语句的验证。攻击者可利用该漏洞执行非法SQL命令窃取数据库敏感数据。
solution:
目前厂商已发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网:
https://wordpress.org/plugins/advanced-coupons-for-woocommerce-free/
patch: WordPress Advanced Coupons for WooCommerce Coupons plugin SQL注入漏洞的补丁
